english.segment1: I couldn't have stopped it or stayed awake. Now caught in the rafters to veil a trace
english.segment2: You covered a vision, it's all I had. Now drink to your poison to feel the stab. Ticking like a time bomb, ticking like a time bomb
english.segment3: I landed here to breathe. I landed here to breathe. But I never felt this strange
english.segment4: Await for an inlay to monitor. But notice that my hands shake and my vision blurred. Dimming till the lights off, dimming till the lights off
